entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 near midnight except 70 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
